game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, players take on the role of a Chronomancer tasked with repairing the timestream. After discovering an ancient prophecy that foretells their own demise, they must navigate treacherous landscapes and battle formidable enemies to reach the Heart of Time before it's too late.
game.beginning: Players awaken in the ruins of a long-lost city, with no memory of who they are or how they got there. As they explore the desolate landscape, they stumble upon ancient artifacts and cryptic messages that hint at their true purpose.
game.ending: With time running out, players successfully reach the Heart of Time, but not without realizing that their actions have created a new timeline, one where they are now trapped in an eternal loop. The player must come to terms with their newfound fate as a prisoner of time.
